entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
